item.title: The Hidden Expenses to Owning a Boat
item.description: Don't buy a vessel without factoring in these costs. They can really add up.

item.title: How to Buy Maxi Doge (MAXI)
item.description: A step-by-step guide on how to buy maxi doge (MAXI) in presale.

item.title: 4 Ways a Government Shutdown Could Affect Your Money
item.description: Furloughs, bare-bones customer service and more are looming if Congress doesn't pass a spending bill ASAP.

item.title: Homebuyers Are Gaining More Purchasing Power as Mortgage Rates Fall
item.description: A borrower with a $3,000 monthly budget can now afford a $468,000 home, about $22,000 more than in June, according to real estate brokerage Redfin.

item.title: Dollar Scholar Asks: Whatâ€™s the Difference Between Cost and Price, and Does It Even Matter?
item.description: Cost and price are so intertwined that, in some cases, which word is correct to use is simply a matter of perspective.
